spell.bagels_spell.nuke.guide: Cast to become Death, destroyer of worlds.
spell.bagels_spell.flower_domain: Plum Blossom Sword Form: Beautiful Day
spell.bagels_spell.flower_domain.guide: Summon a domain of cherry blossoms, applying weakness and reducing armors of other entities.
spell.bagels_spell.flower_step: Plum Blossom Sword Form: Flower Step
spell.bagels_spell.flower_step.guide: Teleport forward, leaving behind falling cherry blossoms.
spell.bagels_spell.flower_slash: Plum Blossom Sword Form: Successive Flower Slash
spell.bagels_spell.flower_slash.guide: Swing your sword in succession, leaving a trail of cherry blossoms.
spell.bagels_spell.flower_surround: Plum Blossom Sword Form: Petal Dance
spell.bagels_spell.flower_surround.guide: A defensive-offensive stance releasing burst slashes around the user.
spell.bagels_spell.thousand_blossom: Plum Blossom Sword Form: Scattering Blossom Strike
spell.bagels_spell.thousand_blossom.guid: Scatter a storm of razor sharp petals, dealing damage.
spell.bagels_spell.six_word_mantra.guide: Chant a mantra, with each extra recast granting a stronger buff.
